TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClrObjectFactory extends System.Object implements class System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IClrObjectFactory

summary.span: 從用戶端啟動以 SOAP 啟用的 COM+ 應用程式 Proxy。

span.span: Activates SOAP-enabled COM+ application proxies from a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是由.NET Framework 內部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 您不需要直接在您的程式碼中使用的類別。You do not need to use the class directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromVroot (string VrootUrl, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromVroot(string VrootUrl, string Mode) cil managed
Public Function CreateFromVroot (VrootUrl As String, Mode As String) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ CreateFromVroot(System::String ^ VrootUrl, System::String ^ Mode);
abstract member CreateFromVroot : string * string -> obj override this.CreateFromVroot : string * string -> obj

param.name: VrootUrl
param.span: 要啟動之物件的虛擬根目錄 URL。

span.span: The virtual root URL of the object to be activated.
Not used.

summary.span: 使用遠端組件的虛擬根目錄 (Virtual Root) URL，並經由 .NET 遠端處理來啟動遠端組件。

span.span: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the virtual root URL of the remote assembly.

returns.span: 表示型別的 執行個體，其文化特性、引數，以及繫結和啟動屬性都設定為 ；或者如果找不到由 參數所識別的組件，則為 。

span.span: An instance of the representing the type, with culture, arguments, and binding and activation attributes set to , or if the assembly identified by the parameter is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將字串附加"？ wsdl"來`VrootUrl`並呼叫啟動遠端物件。 appends the string "?wsdl" to `VrootUrl` and calls to activate the remote object. .NET 遠端處理所使用版本的是 SOAP 的 RPC / encoded，非文件 / 常值，這是 SOAP 的必要的 SOAP 互通性。The version of SOAP used by .NET remoting is RPC/encoded, not document/literal, which is required for SOAP interoperability. 因此，不適用於大部分的 ASMX Web 服務。Therefore, will not work with most ASMX Web services. 需要在本機電腦上的系統管理權限執行，因為它會建立並安裝用戶端 proxy 進行通訊與遠端組件的第一次。 requires administrative privileges on the local computer the first time it is run, because it creates and installs a client proxy for communication with the remote assembly.

exception.span: 呼叫鏈結中的呼叫端沒有存取 Unmanaged 程式碼的使用權限。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

exception.span: 無法開啟執行緒語彙基元 (Token)。

span.span: The thread token could not be opened.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public object CreateFromWsdl (string WsdlUrl, string Mode);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CreateFromWsdl(string WsdlUrl, string Mode) cil managed
Public Function CreateFromWsdl (WsdlUrl As String, Mode As String) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ CreateFromWsdl(System::String ^ WsdlUrl, System::String ^ Mode);
abstract member CreateFromWsdl : string * string -> obj override this.CreateFromWsdl : string * string -> obj

span.span: The WSDL URL of the Web service.
Not used.

summary.span: 使用 XML Web Service 的 Web 服務描述語言 (Web Services Description Language，WSDL)，並經由 .NET 遠端處理來啟動遠端組件。

span.span: Activates a remote assembly through .NET remoting, using the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) of the XML Web service.

returns.span: 表示型別的 執行個體，其文化特性、引數，以及繫結和啟動屬性都設定為 ；或者如果找不到由 參數所識別的組件，則為 。

span.span: An instance of the representing the type, with culture, arguments, and binding and activation attributes set to , or if the assembly identified by the parameter is not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理傳入的 WSDL，如果有必要，產生的 proxy，然後啟動遠端物件。Processes the WSDL passed in and, if necessary, generates a proxy, then activates the remote object. .NET 遠端處理所使用版本的是 SOAP 的 RPC / encoded，非文件 / 常值，這是 SOAP 的必要的 SOAP 互通性。The version of SOAP used by .NET remoting is RPC/encoded, not document/literal, which is required for SOAP interoperability. 因此，不適用於大部分的 ASMX Web 服務。Therefore, will not work with most ASMX Web services. 需要在本機電腦上的系統管理權限執行，因為它會建立並安裝用戶端 proxy 進行通訊與遠端組件的第一次。 requires administrative privileges on the local computer the first time it is run, because it creates and installs a client proxy for communication with the remote assembly.

exception.span: 呼叫鏈結中的呼叫端沒有存取 Unmanaged 程式碼的使用權限。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

exception.span: 無法開啟執行緒語彙基元 (Token)。

span.span: The thread token could not be opened.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .
